pullrequest.title: Fixes issue #19, where acquisition after wait is not handled properly

content.raw:
Excellent, this looks good to me, thanks for the fix!

Feel free to apply it to the other classes - if you make additional commits in this branch they will show up in this pull request and I'll merge them all at once. I'll make sure to apply the fix to the "unified" NI DAQmx class that hasn't been merged into the main repository yet.
content.html:
Excellent, this looks good to me, thanks for the fix!

Feel free to apply it to the other classes - if you make additional commits in this branch they will show up in this pull request and I'll merge them all at once. I'll make sure to apply the fix to the "unified" NI DAQmx class that hasn't been merged into the main repository yet.
